column2: A JavaScript touch gesture detection library for the modern web

column5: message

Merge pull request #36 from wagoid/master

Add Server Side Rendering Support
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/zingchart/zingtouch

Merge pull request #55 from mvanderkamp/mergeback

Switch angular measurement from degrees to radians

Remove CIRCLE_DEGREES constants

These constants are unused as of the switch to radians for angular
measurements.
Switch angular measurement from degrees to radians

Merge pull request #54 from mvanderkamp/mergeback

Speed up distanceBetweenTwoPoints, and standardize getGestureProgess usage

Standardize use of getGestureProgress()

Most gestures were passing this.getId() into getGestureProgress, but a
couple of the gestures were passing in this.type. As far as I can tell
the whole 'progress' mechanism depends on consistency across all
Gestures to prevent collisions, so I switched them all to this.getId().
Use Math.hypot() to get distance between 2 points

Fixes array typo
Adds ChromeHeadlessNoSandbox to karma browsers
Adds sandbox flags for ci
Updates webpack and test dependencies
Replace phantomjs for puppeteer/headlesschrome
Prefer gesture 'Distance' instead of 'Pinch', updates docs to reflect new gesture

Merge pull request #48 from mvanderkamp/master

Updates, bug fixes, and cleanup
Committing updated distributables.
Initial commit of package-lock.json.

Fix Rotate jittery-ness!

This happened as a result of cleaning up the arbiter a bit and
noticing that it wasn't using the proper getter for gesture IDs.
Trying to fix up the jittery-ness of Rotates.
Use 'const' instead of 'let'.
In Pinch move(): extract 'return' to bottom of fn.
Use 'const' instead of 'let' where possible.
Refactor Pan move(): switch to forEach i/o counted loop
Refactor Pan move: hoist 'output' to proper scope
Add 'change' to Pan output.
Extract inner packData method in Pan's move()
More fixing of use of Array prototype methods.
Fix use of Array prototype methods.
Use 'Array#find' instead of counted loop.
Fix tests to account for normalizeEvent change.
Make normalizeEvent an object (more efficient).
Remove unused calculation, use 'const' i/o 'let'

Use common 'Pinch' gesture instead of Distance.

Pinch reports a 'change' piece of data that allows the user to
distinguish between what were previously termed Pinch and Expand.
Add repository field to package.json
Update index.js to use default export when importing from zingtouch.min.js
Fixes custom expand recognizer #37

Changes logic to track if gestures originated from the correct bound element

Slight readme updates

Minor edits and copyright update!  Look contributions!

Merge pull request #2 from HugoGiraudel/patch-1

Added syntax highlighting to readme
Added link of demos to the codepen collection
Added syntax highlighting to readme
Formatting on browser compat on readme
Added browser compatibility to readme
Exposed production file, updated build include instructions, and added license
Fixed broken readme h1 outlink
Swapped out codeclimate for a public one
Fixed test cases, updated readme to reflect old api changes
Prefer array functions over accumulators
Refactored state updates, favored forEach and arrow instead of for loops
Fixed issue with Region.unbind not working
Microsoft prevent default disabling through css
Removed thresholdDirection from Pan gesture. Direction can be interpreted from emitted 'currentDirection' angle
normalized parameter names, collapsed some emitted properties to be accessible through a data array (pan and swipe).
Added currentDirection and directionFromOrigin to Pan
Generalized state.updateInputs and fixed an issue with panning and thresholds
Added PointerEvent detection for MS Edge
Added comment documentation and fixed a few method signatures
Removed the Press Gesture. Can easily be derived from Tap
Added ids for regions and implemented gesture wide id tracking
Region bug fix and fixed issue where events would not propagate up to all listeners
Added a check for state events/ lost focus on the browser
Changed arbiter to grab bindings based off of x/y instead of event.target to properly propagate events. Fixed Pinch
Implemented a new way to check if events are within regions, and fixed the Distance class for checking activeInputs
Replaced synthetic event propagation for the native one, and fixed a bug with expand and pinch not resetting progress
Bugfix for a leftover reference for State
Reduced Distance's threshold and introduced threshold to Pan
Added update method to Gesture Class to update internal properties on the fly
Added an abstract class 'Distance' and subclassed Expand and Pinch from it
Moved the min delay from Press into Tap and utilized it more as a subclass
Added the Press Gesture
Set a Gesture's id to be 'type-id' instead of a number
Added ZingEvent information to each event.detail, and fixed a bug where multiple events bound to the same key were being fired n times
Arbiter now looks at the event's .currentTarget instead of it's .target
Added capture parameter to the Region contructor
Fixed documentation badge link to esdocs
Cleaned up Region bind and unbind logic
Added codeclimate and esdoc badges
Changed ZingTouch.Listener to ZingTouch.Region

README documentation of the API

Broke up lines to meet max char < 100
Implemented bindOnce
Implemented unbind, register, and unregister
Removed test files

Exposed internal limits as parameters for Swipe
Complete code documentation with jsdocs
Complete code documentation for esdoc

Keeping track of swipe moves in addition to applying a time distortion

Changes to the rotate algorithm
